description:
**Key Responsibilities**
 HRSD Implementation \\& Development

+ Case and Knowledge Management
+ Employee Service Center (ESC)
+ Lifecycle Events (Onboarding, Offboarding, Employee Transitions)
+ Playbooks and HR Templates

* Customize HR workflows, forms, record producers, and UI components.


 Platform Configuration \\& Customization
   

  

* Develop and maintain Client Scripts, UI Policies, Business Rules, and Flow Designer workflows.
* Build and enhance HR solutions using:
+ Flow Designer and Integration Hub
+ Service Catalog and HR Catalog Items
+ HR Knowledge Base and portal enhancements

* Ensure adherence to HR data privacy, security standards, and role\\-based access controls (ACLs).


 Integrations \\& Automation
   

  

* Integrate ServiceNow HRSD with external HR systems such as Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, and Oracle HCM using REST/SOAP APIs.
* Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues to ensure secure and accurate data exchange.


 Collaboration \\& Support
   

  

* Work closely with HR teams, business analysts, and architects to gather requirements and deliver effective HR solutions.
* Provide ongoing application support, enhancements, and platform upgrades.
* Participate in testing, deployment, and documentation activities.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* 5\\-7 years of hands\\-on experience as a ServiceNow Developer.

* Experience integrating ServiceNow with third\\-party systems using REST/SOAP APIs.
* Strong understanding of the ServiceNow data model, security, and ACLs.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA).
* ServiceNow HRSD Implementation Certification (highly preferred).
* Experience with Employee Center / Employee Center Pro.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
